message.original: 海はやっぱいいモンですね 小せぇ不安とか、どうでもよくなりますよ
message.translation: Seeing the ocean is a great feeling. It calms the mind.

message.original: 灯台の上までいってみちゃどうです 結構遠くまで見渡せそうですぜ
message.translation: How about going to the top of the lighthouse? It looks quite faraway from here.

message.original: 漂流船ってなぁ、どこから流れて くるんでしょうね 港洞の洋撃船でもねぇようですし
message.translation: Where do these drifting ships come from? Must be from a distant harbor in the west.

message.original: 海岸は見通しがききますねぇ 谷以外はそれほど視界を遮るモンも ありませんし
message.translation: We have an excellent view of the coast from here.

message.original: 南の浜はリンドブルムやら 厄介なヤツも出るようです ローテス側たぁえらい差ですねぇ
message.translation: The southern coast seems to have something dire there. Unlike Rotes, the farther south, the more dangerous it becomes.
